evidence.claim: Utilizing AWS for cloud infrastructure and data storage solutions.
Complying with HIPAA regulations for handling patient data securely.
Implementing X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange in healthcare.
Using FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Adopting microservices architecture for scalable application deployment.

icp.icp_reason: Premium Care USA utilizes X12 transactions and has a strong tech stack for API automation.
matched_use_cases: Integration with Payer and Provider systems through APIs
